metadata.subtitle: Music-only themed radio streams, made from NTS resident and guest shows
metadata.credits: Residents and guests whose radio shows feature in these mixtapes:

results.title: Poolside
results.subtitle: Balearic, boogie, and sophisti-pop for poolsides, beaches and car stereos.
results.description: Whisk yourself away with an unlimited supply of NTS’ most sun-kissed mixes, crossing all borders and genres.
results.description_html: Whisk yourself away with an unlimited supply of NTS’ most sun-kissed mixes, crossing all borders and genres.

credits.name: SUN RUNNERS 女神の恋人達

results.title: Labyrinth
results.subtitle: Enter the void.
results.description: Lose yourself in atmospheric breaks, tripped out techno, and cerebral electronics.
results.description_html: Lose yourself in atmospheric breaks, tripped out techno, and cerebral electronics.

results.title: Feelings
results.subtitle: Sweet soul, gospel, boogie, and beyond.
results.description: Warm your soul with our anthology of emotive popular music from the 20th century, taking you from doo-wop to disco.
results.description_html: Warm your soul with our anthology of emotive popular music from the 20th century, taking you from doo-wop to disco.

results.title: The Tube
results.subtitle: Oddball post-punk, industrial provocation, and minimal wave.
results.description: Rip it up and start again as we explore the differing strains of avant-garde music that immediately followed punk.
results.description_html: Rip it up and start again as we explore the differing strains of avant-garde music that immediately followed punk.

credits.name: J D Twitch - Post Punk Special

results.title: Heartlands
results.subtitle: Celebrating folk and traditional music from all corners of the world.
results.description: Expand your musical knowledge with an NTS archive of recorded folk and indigenous musical traditions.
results.description_html: Expand your musical knowledge with an NTS archive of recorded folk and indigenous musical traditions.

credits.name: EL HUMO MUNDIAL CON SONIDO MARTINES

results.title: Expansions
results.subtitle: Jazz and its many mind-expanding variations.
results.description: Embark on a never-ending astral journey from Sun Ra to George Duke, via obscure Polish jazz cassettes, stacks of spiritual jazz, excursions in Ethiopiques and jazz-adjacent genres.
results.description_html: Embark on a never-ending astral journey from Sun Ra to George Duke, via obscure Polish jazz cassettes, stacks of spiritual jazz, excursions in Ethiopiques and jazz-adjacent genres.

credits.name: Organic Music Tokyo w/ Chee Shimizu

results.title: Low Key
results.subtitle: Keeping it simple with lo-fi hip-hop and smooth R’n’B.
results.description: Covering everything chill – whether that’s downtempo beats, Golden Age hip-hop or grown ‘n’ sexy slow jams.
results.description_html: Covering everything chill – whether that’s downtempo beats, Golden Age hip-hop or grown ‘n’ sexy slow jams.

results.title: Sweat
results.subtitle: A new wave of international party music.
results.description: Dress to sweat and lock in to the beat of soundsystems, block parties, and carnivals around the world.
results.description_html: Dress to sweat and lock in to the beat of soundsystems, block parties, and carnivals around the world.

credits.name: Autotune the World w/ DJ Cuica

results.title: Memory Lane
results.subtitle: Turn on, tune in, drop out.
results.description: Turn back the clock and lose yourself in a world of counter-cultural folk, LSD-laced psychedelia, sweet soul and raw garage rock.
results.description_html: Turn back the clock and lose yourself in a world of counter-cultural folk, LSD-laced psychedelia, sweet soul and raw garage rock.

results.title: Island Time
results.subtitle: Easy skanking - reggae, dub, and plenty more.
results.description: From the Caribbean to the world. Raise a toast to the one drop rhythms of roots reggae, sweet lovers rock and vintage dub.
results.description_html: From the Caribbean to the world. Raise a toast to the one drop rhythms of roots reggae, sweet lovers rock and vintage dub.

credits.name: All Fruits Ripe w/ Jack Sapsed

results.title: Slow Focus
results.subtitle: Meditative, relaxing and beatless: ambient, drone and ragas.
results.description: Tune in and zone out with NTS’ compendium of the beatless and transcendental. Calming sounds to help you focus or drift away.
results.description_html: Tune in and zone out with NTS’ compendium of the beatless and transcendental. Calming sounds to help you focus or drift away.

results.title: 4 To The Floor
results.subtitle: House and techno from past to present.
results.description: The beat goes on: music to make you move, whether it’s house from Chicago, techno from Detroit or NYC disco.
results.description_html: The beat goes on: music to make you move, whether it’s house from Chicago, techno from Detroit or NYC disco.

results.title: Rap House
results.subtitle: 808s and champagne.
results.description: Non-stop rap, trap, and drill, from one side of the Atlantic to another. Experimental, emo, Soundcloud, and more - turn it up to turn up.
results.description_html: Non-stop rap, trap, and drill, from one side of the Atlantic to another. Experimental, emo, Soundcloud, and more - turn it up to turn up.

credits.name: The SLAP Pack w/ DJ Kita

results.title: Field Recordings
results.subtitle: Natural ambience from NTS listeners around the world.
results.description: Our listener-submitted archive of field recordings, featuring the sounds of your homes, suburbs, cities, gardens and jungles.
results.description_html:
Our listener-submitted archive of field recordings, featuring the sounds of your homes, suburbs, cities, gardens and jungles.

Send us your own recordings for consideration.

credits.name: Maxim Walker / O A K M I L K
Miguel Sodré Aguiar Costa e Moura
